name: Four Fierce Heroes 2.0
description:
Four Fierce Heroes V2

A fantasy story following four heroes in a classic RPG style game. 

Will you make it? Or break it? 

Also includes mini-games for a change. 

Expected time to finish game : maximum 3 hours.

Download the game --->Unzip it--->Open" FourFierceHeroes.exe" --->Have fun!

Check Four Fierce Heroes trailers here!

It's my first indie project so all comments will be welcomed in order to improve myself.

Update: 28/07/2020: Game has been tweaked slightly for player's convenience, also added in-game save feature. Please delete previous "FourFierceHeroes.exe" file downloaded in your PC  and download the latest file again via "Download Now" below.

Note: Previous Four Fierce Heroes game file could not be searched in browse bar. That's why it's being re-uploaded as FFH V2. 

Game guide/spoiler:

1. Directional control using keyboard up, down, left, right. Press Z/ENTER/Space to select and interact with objects and npc. Press X to cancel.

2. Interact with all npc, letters, chests, stars, crystals, books.

3. Battle system heavily focused on Magic. 

4. Use green port key to fully restore HP/MP and save.

5.  Interact with NPC for mini-game.

6. Ignore equipment.

7. Respawnable mini-boss monsters.
